name: HideNSeek (cbstory)
description:
Controls and Game Play Mechanics

Movement: W,S,A,D 

Jump: Spacebar

Look around: mouse 

Throw Ball: Left Mouse Click

Flashlight: F 

Charge Flashlight: C 

Use the flashlight sparingly it will start with a full charge and batteries or emergency changing using the "C" key can recharge your flashlight. If your flashlight is activated the wolf can not hurt you,but the moment it goes out it will pounce. 

The goal of the game is to find a key located within the maze and get out through the doors within the center of the maze. 

More balls and batteries can be located in chests scattered throughout the maze. 

The wolf can be temporarily defeated using a ball, but he will come back very quickly so speed is important. 

Good Luck!
